patthana21.26:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.26:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.26:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.26:3.1_1: Nanahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
